title: Homeworking in the UK labour market
publisher: International trade in services by subnational areas of the UK: 2018
description: Breakdowns of the prevalence of homeworking by industry, occupation, region, age, sex and ethnicity.
datasetNotes: On the landing page scroll to your download option and click on the latest optin
notes: Although this figures are for 2019 they were used in a a publication by ONS Coronavirus and home-working in the UK labour market: 2019
